question: [File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Consensus.AEDPoS/AEDPoSContract_GetConsensusBlockExtraData.cs] [Function: GetConsensusExtraDataToPublishOutValue()] [OutValue Preimage Attack] Can attacker generate multiple InValues with same OutValue hash to corrupt random number generation? (Critical)
